programme.title: Seth Meyers: Dad Man Walking

programme.title: The Florida Project
programme.desc: A single mother lives with her 6-year-old daughter in a cheap Florida motel run by a tough but kind manager. The girl spends her time daydreaming and playing with other kids, while her mom struggles to make ends meet in this touching, powerful drama. (Repeat).

programme.title: Civil War
programme.desc: In the not-so-distant future, the United States finds itself plunged into a dystopian nightmare as violent conflict erupts across the nation. A team of scrappy journalists entrenched in the military bands together to venture to the nation's capital before a troupe of rebels destroys the last bastion of normalcy in the country. (Repeat).

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: This horror-mystery film follows awkward teen Owen who, in the 1990s, becomes a big fan of a monster-driven horror television show called The Pink Opaque. In school, he encounters another awkward teen, Maddy, who also likes the show. The two form a bond by watching the show. But when the show is canceled, their interaction also dwindles. Reconnecting again in their twenties, they revisit their fandom of the show as their reality also starts shifting mysteriously. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dream Scenario
programme.desc: The narrative follows a very unkempt professor named Paul Matthews. His life is quite uneventful until suddenly, his image appears in people's dreams. Soon, millions of strangers find themselves dreaming about him. The event made him an overnight sensation. However, things change when these dreams soon become nightmares for some and, later, for many. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: Trying to Get to Heaven Before They Close the Door
programme.desc: After the fallout at Christmas, Jules and Rue face one another as the group celebrates the New Year. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: As the semester kicks off, Jules questions Rue and Elliot's new friendship. While Cal hunts for answers, Nate makes a tough decision. The lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur as Kat ponders her relationship, and Maddy contemplates the decision to end hers. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: Rue pursues a new business venture as she helps forge a friendship between Jules and Elliot. Cassie settles into a routine, while Lexi pours herself into mounting a school play. Maddy considers getting back together with Nate, and Cal finds a target. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: You Who Cannot See, Think of Those Who Can
programme.desc: At Maddy's birthday party, relationships are celebrated and questioned. Jules turns to Elliot for advice and Cal takes a trip down memory lane. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: Rue finds herself being questioned after Jules reveals the truth of her relapse. Rue attempts to locate the suitcase in an attempt to avoid rehab. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: A Thousand Little Trees of Blood
programme.desc: As relationships with mothers are tested, Rue tries to recover. Meanwhile, Lexi questions the possible backlash from her play, and Nate celebrates his newfound freedom. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: Art imitates life as the East Highland crew watches their complicated dynamics reflected in Lexi's long-awaited play. Meanwhile, Fezco gets ready to attend. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: All My Life, My Heart Has Yearned for a Thing I Cannot Name
programme.desc: As the show goes on, fragments of memories collide with the present and future. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Zone of Interest
programme.desc: Set during the Holocaust, the historical drama centers on the life of a German commandant named Rudolf Hoss. Living in a private house next to the Auschwitz concentration camp, Rudolf and his wife Hedwig dream of building the perfect family life. As the days of the Nazi occupation come to an end, the couple struggles with their different priorities. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: After her beloved grandmother is diagnosed with terminal cancer, a Chinese-American woman returns to China for a family gathering secretly designed to say goodbye to the matriarch. However, when it becomes apparent that grandma is the only one unaware of the diagnosis, she struggles to keep the secret. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tuesday
programme.desc: The family drama film centers on teenager Tuesday and her relationship with her mother, Zora. In a surreal twist, Tuesday finds a talking bird that she soon discovers is Death in disguise. Mother and daughter find themselves dealing with this unique encounter as a team despite their different perspecties. What follows is an eye-opening journey where the duo explore the depths of loss and love in unexpected ways. (Repeat).

programme.title: Problemista
programme.desc: A young immigrant from El Salvador is facing his last month in the United States unless he can find a sponsor. Living in New York City has been tough as his career as a toy creator has not gone to plan. At the eleventh hour, he finds a unique artist who may become his sponsor—as long as he helps her with her next exhibition. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cyrus
programme.desc: In this offbeat comedy, divorcé John (John C. Reilly) hits it off with a pretty woman (Marisa Tomei) at a party. They begin a relationship, but her adult son Cyrus (Jonah Hill) has a profound attachment to her and he wants John out of her life. Directed by the Duplass brothers. (Repeat).

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: In this intriguing dramedy, an investment banker copes with his wife's sudden death by dismantling the machines surrounding him. Meanwhile, his complaints to a vending-machine company spark an unexpected relationship with a customer-service rep. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: This stunning thriller follows discredited journalist Mikael Blomkvist (Daniel Craig) and mysterious computer hacker Lisbeth Salander as they work together to solve the mystery of a 40-year-old murder and uncover the dark secrets of a wealthy family. (Repeat).

programme.title: Traffik
programme.desc: A couple head off for a romantic weekend in the mountains. Isolated at a remote estate, they are surprised by the arrival of two friends, but just when the weekend starts to get back on track, a violent biker gang turns up and begins to torment them. (Repeat).

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding
programme.desc: Reclusive gym manager Lou falls hard for Jackie, an ambitious bodybuilder headed through town to Las Vegas in pursuit of her dream. But their love ignites violence, pulling them deep into the web of Lou's criminal family. (Repeat).

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: Teenager Jody and her dad accompany each other at a music concert featuring pop star Lady Raven. Excited to share a night of music and fun, Jody and her dad soon become entangled in a deadly game. While she enjoys the music, her dad discovers a frantic FBI search for a deranged killer called The Butcher. As the hunt intensifies, a sinister truth is revealed. (Repeat).

programme.title: Good Time
programme.desc: Constantine Nikas lands himself in hot water when his younger brother gets thrown in prison after their bank-robbery attempt goes south. This nonstop thrill ride follows Constantine as he tries to free his sibling from jail by going deeper into the chaotic and violent underbelly of New York City. (Repeat).

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: The third installment of the horror franchise follows adult film star Maxine Minx after escaping a Texas massacre. She claws her way to 1980s Hollywood pursuing a dream role. But a killer stalks LA's starlets. As blood spills, Maxine's dark past threatens to shatter her shot at fame. (Repeat).

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In a small town in 1989 Maine, seven bullied kids discover that a malevolent force is preying on the local children. Soon, they band together to destroy the monster, a killer clown called Pennywise, in this nerve-shredding horror film. (Repeat).

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: Young dancers gather in a remote and empty school building to rehearse on a cold and wintry night. The all-night celebration soon turns into a hallucinatory nightmare when they learn that their sangria is laced with LSD. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a memoir by Jeannette Walls, a young woman reflects on her unconventional upbringing at the hands of her artsy, nonconformist parents. Now married to a man who works in finance in New York, she faces criticism from her parents that she's betrayed their values. (Repeat).

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Astronauts travel to the moon to study a black monolith before another mission to Jupiter goes awry due to a malfunctioning computer system. Later regaining control of his spaceship, the surviving astronaut travels through a dazzling star-gate on a mysterious evolutionary mission. Featuring groundbreaking, Oscar-winning special effects. (Repeat).

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: In this moving drama, two aging friends, one a retired composer and the other a filmmaker working on a new project, go on vacation together at a spa resort in the Alps. There, they take stock of their lives and reflect on their artistic accomplishments. (Repeat).

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: After being diagnosed with a rare form of dementia that has a rapid decline, John Knox tries desperately to continue his work as a hitman, with memory loss getting in the way. When John's son Miles shows up at his door begging for help because he's killed the man who impregnated his daughter, John goes into overdrive with his friend Xavier to cover up the crime. Unfortunately, his good intentions for Miles backfires, and soon, his son is involved in John's criminal world. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Rider
programme.desc: A young Native American rodeo cowboy faces an identity crisis after suffering a near-fatal head injury and being told that he can never ride again. When he takes on the grueling job of training a wild horse he finds it exhilarating, but also a sad reminder that the direction of his life is forever altered. (Repeat).

programme.title: Don't Let Go
programme.desc: Mourning the loss of three of his family members, a detective receives a haunting phone call from his deceased niece, who is existing on an alternate timeline two weeks prior. It is now up to Jack to talk her through the coming days to save her and her family's lives in this mystery thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: In this relentless psychological thriller, blue-collar worker Adam Cassidy becomes a corporate spy for a ruthless CEO who wants him to infiltrate the competition. In time, Adam realizes that he's being used as a pawn in a much-larger game. (Repeat).

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: Rust Belt ex-con Russell is released from prison and must choose between escaping his life of poverty or saving his younger brother Rodney, who has fallen in with a dangerous crime ring. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: Director M. Night Shyamalan followed the chilling "The Sixth Sense" with this riveting thriller. Bruce Willis is security guard David Dunn, who survives a devastating train wreck miraculously unharmed. The owner (Samuel L. Jackson) of a comic-book art gallery sees him as a mysterious protector with a higher calling, but Dunn is doubtful. Robin Wright Penn, Spencer Treat Clark, Eamonn Walker. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The biographical drama chronicles the rise of the four Von Erich brothers in the field of professional wrestling in the 1980s. Coached by their father Fritz Von Erich, Kevin, Kerry, David, and Mike become famous wrestling champions as they dominate the ring with countless victories. Soon, their fame turns into a curse when deadly tragedy strikes the Von Erich family. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Upside of Anger
programme.desc: Wonderful performances and rich characters color this comedy-drama starring Joan Allen and Kevin Costner. Allen excels as a suburban housewife and mother of four daughters who spins into bitter alcoholism after her husband leaves her. But her romantic life becomes even more complicated when she's drawn to a boozy, lazy ex-baseball player (Costner). Erika Christensen, Evan Rachel Wood. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: This bittersweet saga dramatizes the rise and fall of Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons, one of the key pop groups of the early '60s, responsible for such iconic hits as "Sherry," "Walk Like a Man" and "Big Girls Don't Cry." (Repeat).

programme.title: Disobedience
programme.desc: A formerly exiled woman returns to her orthodox Jewish family after the death of her father. Her family is shocked by her visit, but her sister-in-law is inspired by her presence to break free from the rigid rules and guidelines of their faith. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.sub-title: When You're Lost in the Darkness
programme.desc: A hardened survivor is hired for an impossible task. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: In 2003, an Indonesian scientist makes a devastating discovery. In 2023, now outside of the quarantine zone, Joel and Tess clash over Ellie's fate as they navigate a long-abandoned Boston overrun with Infected. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After a global pandemic, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: After a pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: On the streets of a newly free Kansas City, Henry fights to protect his brother Sam from rebel soldiers who will stop at nothing to appease their ruthless leader. As her manhunt continues, Kathleen doubles down on her quest for revenge, while Ellie forms a meaningful friendship. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After months of traveling, Joel and Ellie receive a grave warning about what lies ahead. Later, Ellie learns more about Joel's past – while Joel tries his best to forget. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: As Joel fights to survive, Ellie's struggle to save him stirs memories of her life in a FEDRA orphanage. Weeks before meeting Joel, Ellie recalls joining her best friend Riley for a night to remember... one that will change the course of both of their lives – and the fate of the world – forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: Ellie crosses paths with a vengeful group of survivors, and draws the attention of its leader. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After being pursued by Infected, a pregnant Anna places her trust in a lifelong friend. Years later, Ellie is forced to grapple with the emotional toll of her journey, while Joel faces a devastating decision of his own. (Repeat).

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: The Mad Max movie prequel follows Furiosa as a young woman after she is snatched from her sanctuary by Dementus' biker horde. When her path collides with the Citadel ruled by the tyrant Immortan Joe, Furiosa finds herself entangled in a power struggle. Furiosa fights through dangerous trials to find her lost loved ones in the Green Place of Many Mothers. She must fight for survival and redemption in order to return home. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
programme.desc: Thorin Oakenshield and his band of dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf, continue their crusade to reclaim Erebor from the dragon Smaug in this sweeping fantasy that picks up where the events of "The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey" left off. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: This adorable comedy follows an ambitious mariachi singer who hopes to convince a customs worker to accept his visa, and finds love in the process. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving Pelican 895
programme.desc: A chronicle of oiled-bird rescues in the aftermath of the 2010 spill in the Gulf of Mexico focuses on the 895th surviving brown pelican as it endures a painstaking process of cleaning and rehabilitation before it can be released back into the wild. (Repeat).

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.desc: An energetic dog and a laid-back cat teach pre-schoolers vocabulary in both English and Spanish. (Repeat).

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The first big-screen adventure of the popular children's (and adults') cartoon series follows SpongeBob as he sets out to retrieve King Neptune's stolen crown, save Mr. Krabs, who has been accused of the theft, and stymie Plankton and his plot for world domination. (Repeat).

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Christopher Reeve as the Man of Steel in a big-budget epic with Oscar-winning effects. Marlon Brando, Margot Kidder, Gene Hackman, Ned Beatty, Valerie Perrine, Jackie Cooper, Susannah York, Glenn Ford. Richard Donner directed. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dark hilarity ensues after the Addams family—and their macabre traditions—relocate to suburbia, 21st century New Jersey. As they prepare for a major celebration that involves their extended family, they have to maneuver around the machinations of a devious reality-television host. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: Bumbling squirrel Scrat accidentally sends an asteroid hurtling toward Earth, which forces Manny the woolly mammoth, Sid the sloth and Diego the saber-toothed tiger to embark on a journey to save the planet in this winning animated sequel. (Repeat).

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: The tiny town of Brightridge is in for a surprise this Christmas as a mysterious reindeer and a plucky young girl work together to help her grandfather save his beloved store. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
programme.desc: Retired spy Marissa (Jessica Alba) is reactivated by her agency in order to stop the Timekeeper from taking the entire planet hostage, and she gets some unexpected help from her stepdaughter Rebecca and stepson Cecil in this family-friendly thrill ride. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A rollicking adventure about a mail-room clerk who finds himself shipwrecked on an island inhabited by a minuscule race of people, who make him look like a giant by comparison. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: In this hilarious installment of the beloved series, Shrek is catapulted into an alternate version of Far Far Away where ogres are persecuted, Rumpelstiltskin rules the land and Princess Fiona doesn't know who he is. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forever My Girl
programme.desc: A country-music star returns to his hometown, where he reconnects with an old flame—and is shocked to learn that they have a daughter together. In time, he reflects on the life he left behind and the man he wants to be in this stirring romance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
programme.desc: Feline spy Kitty Galore plots to conquer the world and gain the upper paw over her rivals in this hilarious comedy-adventure. In order to fight this unforeseen threat, cats and dogs must band together to face a common enemy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Big Miracle
programme.desc: Alaskan newsman Adam Carlson (John Krasinski) and Greenpeace volunteer Rachel Kramer team up to help free a family of gray whales that are trapped in the Arctic Circle in this uplifting drama inspired by actual events. (Repeat).

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: In this superhero stunner, after being sent to Earth from planet Krypton by his parents with a special object from his home planet in tow, Clark Kent grows up with the help of his earthly adopted parents and later assumes the identity of Superman and sets out to defend Earth from the villainous General Zod. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shorts
programme.desc: Imagination breeds hilarity when a rainbow-colored rock grants a boy named Toe (Jimmy Bennett) his every wish, causing his corporate-run town to be overrun with miniature spaceships and crocodile armies. Once the grown-ups get their hands on the rock, the real trouble begins. (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
programme.desc: Excellent coming-of-age fare about a new kid (Luke Benward) in school who may have bitten off more than he can chew when he bets the school bully (Adam Hicks) that he can swallow 10 creepy crawlies. Written and directed by Bob Dolman, who adapted the 1973 Thomas Rockwell kid-lit best seller, which received an animated TV treatment in 1985. Hallie Kate Eisenberg, Tom Cavanagh, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, James Rebhorn. (Repeat).

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: A game show that invites grade-school kids to play interactively through their TVs. A mind-scrambling menu of educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. Includes subjects like history, math, spelling and nature. (Repeat).

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: Grade-school kids play interactively educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. (Repeat).

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: Grade-school kids play interactively educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Grade-school kids play interactively educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. (Repeat).

programme.desc: This game show invites grade-school kids to play interactively through their TVs. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Grade-school kids play interactively educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Grade-school kids play interactively educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. (Repeat).

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: Grade-school kids play interactively educational brain teasers and puzzles, presented by a truly nutty band of state-of-the-art animated characters. (Repeat).

programme.title: Temple Grandin
programme.desc: A portrait of animal scientist Temple Grandin, who, as a young woman in the 1960s and 1970s, overcame the stigma of autism to become a leading authority on the humane treatment of livestock. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: In this spirited fantasy adventure, the Smurfs take an unexpected trip through a portal and land in the middle of New York City, and they must find their way home before their archnemesis Gargamel (Hank Azaria) tracks them down. Directed by Raja Gosnell. (Repeat).

programme.title: Menashe
programme.desc: This moving drama centers on a Hasidic Jewish man living in New York City who fights to retain custody of his son after his wife's death, as tradition dictates that the boy must be raised in a household with a mother. If he doesn't remarry quickly, his son will be adopted by his late spouse's stern brother. (Repeat).

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: Schoolboy Bryce (Callan McAuliffe) realizes that the girl he has struggled to avoid may be his one true love in this heartfelt romantic comedy. Over the course of six years, Juli pines for Bryce, who does everything in his power to put her off. Later, as the pair enter junior high, Bryce discovers girls and realizes his true feelings for Juli. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Chipmunk brothers Alvin, Simon and Theodore, with lovely (though high-pitched) singing voices, become pop sensations in this rollicking comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore enter a battle-of-the-bands competition and face off against a group of female singing chipmunks known as the Chippettes in this wacky and hilarious sequel to the family-friendly hit. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: In this charming family film, Alvin, Simon and Theodore head out on the road in a desperate race to find Dave after they are led to believe that he is about to propose to his girlfriend and leave them behind forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Tough Love
programme.desc: Madea has a run-in with the law and finds herself sentenced to community service. After discovering that the local youth center is in danger of being shut down, she enlists the help of her family and the neighborhood kids to save it. (Repeat).

programme.title: Aquaman and The Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The sequel follows Aquaman as he prepares for another battle against Black Manta. Equipped with the deadly Black Trident, Black Manta is determined to avenge his father's death. With no one by his side, Aquaman seeks the help of his brother Orm, hoping to build a strong alliance that can empower him to defeat Black Manta who vows to kill him at all costs. Aquaman must push himself and overlook the differences he has with his brother to save the world from destruction. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Sam Neill is back as paleontologist Alan Grant for another wild walk in the park. William H. Macy and Tea Leoni costar as a couple whose son is lost on a remote dino-infested island. Posing as wealthy adventurers, they lure Grant to the island to help in their search, and all three get much more than they bargained for. The special effects are outstanding. Alessandro Nivola, Trevor Morgan, Michael Jeter. (Repeat).

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Entertaining biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best. (Repeat).

programme.title: El Espiritu de la Salsa
programme.desc: New Yorkers from all walks of life, including a doctor, a police officer, a construction worker and a Wall Street trader, come to Spanish Harlem to learn the art of salsa dancing from instructor Tomas Guerrero. Directed by Francisco Bello and Tim Sternberg. (Repeat).

programme.title: How Do You Measure a Year?
programme.desc: For 17 years, filmmaker Jay Rosenblatt filmed his daughter Ella on her birthday in the same spot, asking her the same questions. In just 29 minutes, we watch her grow from a toddler to a young woman with all the beautiful and sometimes awkward stages in between. Each phase is captured fleetingly but makes an indelible mark. Her responses to her father's questions are just a backdrop for a deeper story of parental love, acceptance, and ultimately, independence. (Repeat).

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.desc: An energetic dog and a laid-back cat teach pre-schoolers vocabulary in both English and Spanish. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The first film in the series introduced maladroit French police inspector Jacques Clouseau, who attempts to foil high-society thieves who have targeted a prize jewel called the Pink Panther. Henry Mancini's score was Oscar nominated. (Repeat).

programme.title: DC League of Super-Pets
programme.desc: This animated tale focuses on Krypto the Super-Dog, otherwise known as Superman's pet. Since he has his own superpowers, Krypto enjoys saving the world with the Man of Steel. However, he finds himself challenged when Superman is kidnapped one day, and the other human superheroes can't help. With the help of superpower-infused animals in a shelter, it's up to Krypto to save the world and save his superhuman. (Repeat).

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.sub-title: From Here to There, De Aqui Para Alla
programme.desc: An energetic dog and a laid-back cat teach preschoolers vocabulary in both English and Spanish. (Repeat).

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: The tiny town of Brightridge is in for a surprise this Christmas as a mysterious reindeer and a plucky young girl work together to help her grandfather save his beloved store. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: As Frodo nears the end of his journey to destroy the One Ring in Mount Doom, he finds himself tempted by its evil powers. Eleven Oscars, including Best Picture, went to director Peter Jackson's majestic finale to his blockbuster trilogy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Inkheart
programme.desc: What a fantastic magical delight this is. Brendan Fraser stars as a book collector who, along with his 12-year-old daughter (Eliza Hope Bennett), has the ability to bring fictional book characters to life, among them a nasty fairy-tale villain who wants to use their powers for his own evil doings. Helen Mirren, Paul Bettany, Andy Serkis. Directed by Iain Softley. The film is adapted from the kid-lit favorite by Cornelia Funke. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Writer-director Tyler Perry's fourth film is an uproarious, insightful comedy about a hard-luck single mom (Angela Bassett) from Chicago who attends her long-estranged father's funeral in rural Georgia and meets a clan of offbeat relatives she didn't know she had. Former NBA star Rick Fox costars as a college hoops coach who is romantically interested in Bassett. Perry costars as Joe and has a cameo as his recurring character, the larger-than-life matriarch, Madea. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: An all-star cast and family-friendly spyjinks power the third chapter of the delightful "Spy Kids" film series. This time, a villainous computer programmer kidnaps Carmen and traps her inside a video game. Her younger brother Juni springs into action and enters the game to rescue her. (Repeat).

programme.title: Marcel: The Shell with Shoes On
programme.desc: The animated film follows the life of a young mollusk named Marcel as he discovers the world anew. When a documentary filmmaker shares an online snippet of Marcel, the shy shell goes viral. Soon, Marcel goes on a life-changing adventure to find his lost family. (Repeat).

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Living in the perfect Barbieland, Barbie and Ken lead a carefree existence, but soon, Ken finds himself questioning his simple life. Enamored by the human world, he convinces Barbie to leave their comfort zone and take a trip outside Barbieland. Soon, the Mattel CEO feels threatened by the duo's daring decision and pursues them to guide them back to where they belong. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A bride-to-be in Greece attempts to solve the mystery of her paternity by reading her mother's diary. Based on the popular ABBA-inspired stage musical. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: This adorable comedy follows an ambitious mariachi singer who hopes to convince a customs worker to accept his visa, and finds love in the process. (Repeat).

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Black Adam is awakened after being imprisoned for nearly five thousand years. This significant being tries to exist in modern climes despite his brusque ways and ancient-trained means. The members of the Justice Society of America try to befriend him, hopefully retraining him as well. They need to come together soon to fight a more powerful villain about to wreak havoc on the world. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forever My Girl
programme.desc: A country-music star returns to his hometown, where he reconnects with an old flame—and is shocked to learn that they have a daughter together. In time, he reflects on the life he left behind and the man he wants to be in this stirring romance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shorts
programme.desc: Imagination breeds hilarity when a rainbow-colored rock grants a boy named Toe (Jimmy Bennett) his every wish, causing his corporate-run town to be overrun with miniature spaceships and crocodile armies. Once the grown-ups get their hands on the rock, the real trouble begins. (Repeat).

programme.title: Belichick & Saban: The Art of Coaching
programme.desc: Bill Belichick and Nick Saban--two of the most successful and revered football coaches in the history of the sport--open up in this documentary that looks at their four-decade-long friendship. Combined with one-on-one interviews and extensive inside access captured over the past three decades, the film includes topics never publicly broached before. (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
programme.desc: Excellent coming-of-age fare about a new kid (Luke Benward) in school who may have bitten off more than he can chew when he bets the school bully (Adam Hicks) that he can swallow 10 creepy crawlies. Written and directed by Bob Dolman, who adapted the 1973 Thomas Rockwell kid-lit best seller, which received an animated TV treatment in 1985. Hallie Kate Eisenberg, Tom Cavanagh, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, James Rebhorn. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: In this thrilling animated adventure, a rare macaw named Blu (voice of Jesse Eisenberg) is brought to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female (voice of Anne Hathaway) of his species, but the pair are kidnapped by a gang of greedy animal smugglers, forcing them to stage a daring escape with the help of some new friends. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A rollicking adventure about a mail-room clerk who finds himself shipwrecked on an island inhabited by a minuscule race of people, who make him look like a giant by comparison. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: In this hilarious installment of the beloved series, Shrek is catapulted into an alternate version of Far Far Away where ogres are persecuted, Rumpelstiltskin rules the land and Princess Fiona doesn't know who he is. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: In this stunning action epic, a tormented Hercules must summon his inner hero to save the kingdom of Thrace from an evil warlord. With the help of his loyal band of mercenaries, he wages a valiant fight to restore peace to the troubled land. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
programme.desc: Retired spy Marissa (Jessica Alba) is reactivated by her agency in order to stop the Timekeeper from taking the entire planet hostage, and she gets some unexpected help from her stepdaughter Rebecca and stepson Cecil in this family-friendly thrill ride. (Repeat).

programme.desc: A group of Black friends, all horror movie enthusiasts, take some time off to spend their vacation in the woods. In the cabin they occupy, an unknown killer starts to threaten them. The group is then ordered to rate each other's degree of blackness to determine the order of who will be killed first.

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Family man Dave (Jason Bateman) and bachelor Mitch (Ryan Reynolds) swap bodies after a night on the town in this uproarious comedy. At first both men enjoy getting a reprieve from their regular routines, but soon they want their old lives back. Things get complicated when Dave's stunning legal associate Sabrina drops a bombshell, and Mitch gets a surprise visit from his estranged father.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: In this thrilling and hilarious reboot of the beloved sci-fi-comedy franchise, two paranormal researchers join forces with a nuclear engineer and a subway attendant to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings.

programme.title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
programme.desc: This spy action-comedy film portrays a fictionalized version of a British intelligence organization called Special Operations Executive. During World War II, the team's main goal is to sabotage efforts by Nazi Germany by conducting and facilitating espionage missions. The group is touted as the forerunner of contemporary military black operations. The force is composed of select military officials and rogues of improper behavior who utilize unconventional tactics.

Before long, however, Charles also develops autonomy.

programme.title: All the Money in the World
programme.desc: Thrilling dramatization of the 1973 kidnapping of John Paul Getty III, the grandson of billionaire J. Paul Getty. John's mother Gail begs Getty to pay the ransom; when he refuses, she decides to rescue her son with the help of Getty's business associate, an ex-CIA agent named Fletcher Chase. Inspired by historical events. Certain scenes, characters and dialogue have been fictionalized for dramatic purposes.

programme.title: She Said
programme.desc: New York Times reporters Jodi Kantor and Megan Twohey try to piece together the details of one of the most controversial stories in recent history, one that would help launch the #MeToo movement. Their objective is to find out the truth about the sexual harassment allegations against Hollywood heavyweight Harvey Weinstein. et they face the obstacle of no female survivors of the incidents seem to want to go on the record to corroborate their story.

programme.title: Of an Age
programme.desc: Kol, a Serbian dancer, goes to help his dance partner Ebony and comes away with much more. When Ebony wakes up on a beach with no recollection of how she got there, Kol rushes to her side. In the process, he meets Adam, Ebony's older brother. The two have a 24-hour romance, ending when Adam has to leave. But their brief relationship means so much to both of them that neither distance nor the future can keep them apart.

programme.title: Rock the Kasbah
programme.desc: In this fish-out-of-water comedy, a grizzled rock manager is stranded in Afghanistan when his client skips town with his passport. He soon discovers a dulcet-voiced Afghani woman, and helps her enter a televised singing competition.

programme.title: The Show
programme.desc: A TV network desperate for ratings launches a reality show on which people who are considering suicide are offered the chance to do it live on-air. A struggling janitor signs up, hoping to help his family survive.

programme.title: She Said

programme.title: Why Men are Clueless
programme.desc: After three years of dating, Omar still has no idea how to keep his girlfriend Diane happy. Instead of showing up for a make-up date, he goes to a meeting for a once-in-a-lifetime job as a writer. She splits with him, and now he has to figure out how she ticks. Worse, his dream job is predicated on him figuring out how all women tick, and his only resources are other clueless men.

programme.title: Cocaine Bear
programme.desc: In Georgia, an unlikely band of police officers, criminals, tourists, and teenagers find themselves thrust into a situation of life or death when an unnaturally large black bear suddenly rampages through the forest after consuming cocaine. The humans must then outlast the creature or face fatal consequences.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: With his kids trapped in the back seat and a bomb that will explode if they get out of the car, a normal commute becomes a twisted game of life or death as Matt Turner follows a stranger's increasingly dangerous instructions in a race against time to save his family.

programme.title: Alex Edelman: Just For Us

programme.desc: Miranda searches for more space for her family; Samantha doesn't let cancer get in the way of a fabulous new hairstyle. Aleksandr: Mikhail Baryshnikov. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Miranda (Cynthia Nixon) settles into her new digs; Samantha is out to disprove the notion that her condition has taken her out of the game. Aleksandr: Mikhail Baryshnikov. Samantha: Kim Cattrall. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Aleksandr (Mikhail Baryshnikov) poses a question to Carrie; Charlotte gets the chance to play mommy; Miranda has doubts about Carrie's beau; Samantha is involved in a mix-up with her maid. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: The penultimate episode in the series starring Golden Globe winner Sarah Jessica Parker, Cynthia Nixon, Kim Cattrall and Kristin Davis. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: In the series finale, Carrie grows restless in Paris; Steve's mother (Anne Meara) becomes disoriented; Charlotte gets news from China; and chemo compromises Sam's libido. Chris Noth, Mikhail Baryshnikov. (Repeat).

programme.title: Barry Munday
programme.desc: Barry Munday (Patrick Wilson) wakes up in the hospital after an attack in a movie theater minus his testicles. Then he discovers that a woman whom he can't remember sleeping with has filed a paternity suit against him. (Repeat).

programme.title: Save Yourselves!
programme.desc: A Brooklyn couple decides to unplug themselves from the internet via a therapeutic retreat to a phone-free cabin in upstate New York. Murderous aliens descend on Earth as they go off the digital grid, leaving them hopelessly uninformed about the apocalypse. (Repeat).

programme.title: Clear History
programme.desc: A marketing executive at an electric-car start-up quits after an argument with his boss, but is crushed when the company hits the big time, so he tries to reinvent his life under a different name in the peace and quiet of Martha's Vineyard. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: In this riotous comedy, Tim wants to snag a big promotion at work, but to do so he must take an eccentric nutcase to his boss's dinner party, where guests are supposed to bring the strangest person they can find. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sam Jay: Salute Me or Shoot Me
programme.desc: Comedian and writer Sam Jay takes the stage at Brooklyn Steel for a hilariously frank discussion on embracing our differences, the stresses of long-term relationships, and the power of empathy. Newly engaged, Jay gets candid about life with her future wife and the unknown stresses of being "the man," the grim reality of trash day, and more. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dan Soder: Son of a Gary
programme.desc: Dan Soder delivers sharp comedy in his first HBO special. He tackles topics like airport drug dogs, quirky customer service, and growing up with an alcoholic dad. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Serious Man
programme.desc: Laughs mix with gasps in this compelling story about a milquetoast physics professor (Michael Stuhlbarg) who finds his life unraveling as he deals with his cheating wife, threats to his tenure and a neighbor who likes to sunbathe naked. (Repeat).

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Diane Keaton are dynamic in this witty romantic comedy. Nicholson plays an aging Lothario with a young girlfriend. He meets his soul mate, however, when he's introduced to his lover's mother, a playwright who can't stand the sight of him. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: The romantic adventures of fashionable New York City writer Carrie Bradshaw (Sarah Jessica Parker) and her three chic friends continue in what could be the ultimate chick flick, a glitzy, gal-pleasing movie adaptation of the popular HBO series. Expect love, marriage plans and maybe even a baby carriage. Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon, Kristen Davis, Chris Noth. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Women
programme.desc: Polished and incisive remake of the 1939 classic about a sisterhood of well-to-do New Yorkers who rally around their friend (Meg Ryan) when they learn her husband is having an affair. As in the original, the film features an all-female cast, including Annette Bening, Jada Pinkett Smith, Eva Mendes and Debra Messing. Written and directed by TV veteran Diane English, who based her script on the 1936 play by Clare Boothe Luce. Rolling Stone Mick Jagger is one of the producers. (Repeat).

programme.title: Amelie
programme.desc: At a tiny Parisian café, the adorable yet painfully shy Amélie accidentally discovers a gift for helping others. Soon Amelie is spending her days as a matchmaker, guardian angel, and all-around do-gooder. But when she bumps into a handsome stranger, will she find the courage to become the star of her very own love story? (Repeat).

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: In this raunchy yet heartfelt comedy, a commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care. Unrated version. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip in this incredibly raunchy comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this hysterical big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Writer-director Tyler Perry's fourth film is an uproarious, insightful comedy about a hard-luck single mom (Angela Bassett) from Chicago who attends her long-estranged father's funeral in rural Georgia and meets a clan of offbeat relatives she didn't know she had. Former NBA star Rick Fox costars as a college hoops coach who is romantically interested in Bassett. Perry costars as Joe and has a cameo as his recurring character, the larger-than-life matriarch, Madea. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A rollicking adventure about a mail-room clerk who finds himself shipwrecked on an island inhabited by a minuscule race of people, who make him look like a giant by comparison. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: Ordinary teen Billy Batson possesses the ability to transform into a superhero alter ego with just a single word. As Batson continues to hone his crimefighting skills and tackle new challenges, he faces a threat that puts his life in jeopardy. The sequel to the 2019 film. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: In the premiere, Vice Principals Neal Gamby and Lee Russell jockey for position when Principal Welles retires. After a failed attempt to rally the teachers, Gamby pens a letter himself to the school board complaining about Belinda. He waits for the walkout, and panics when nothing happens. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: A school evaluator's arrival rattles Gamby and Russell, who cross boundaries with Dr. Brown. Watching Janelle ride, Gamby learns she might change to motocross. Gamby thinks he sees Blythe in the distance, and follows him to his car, kicking the vehicle before finding out it isn't Blythe after all. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Danny wants to impress Amanda on a field trip organized by history teacher Mr. Hayden (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: A homecoming football game may be just the thing for Gamby and Russell to bring about Dr. Brown's downfall. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Gamby's disciplinary tactics are rebuked by Dr. Brown; Russell clashes with an unruly neighbor. At school, Belinda wants Gamby to vary his hardball approach to discipline, implementing a brand-new initiative known as Circles, where students "talk it out." Annoyed with the progress of their mission, Lee and Gamby question their partnership, and their relationship is put to test. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: A shipment of missing books prompts Dr. Brown to reprimand a veteran teacher; Amanda and Gamby make a deal. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Dr. Brown is rattled by the unexpected arrival of her ex-husband; Gamby and Amanda bond during teacher workday; Russell finds his patience tested. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Gamby and Russell stay the course with their plan. Meanwhile, Gamby wants to know the extent of Amanda's relationship with Bill. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: The first season concludes with Gamby and Russell playing their endgame with Dr. Brown. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: In the Season 2 premiere, Gamby recovers from his wounds, but finds that North Jackson High School has changed dramatically during his absence. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Gamby fingers a suspect, with some help from Dayshawn; Russell tries out a kindness strategy at school. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Gamby's hunt for his shooter leads him into a novelist's graduate-school class; Russell's ire is fueled by an unflattering caricature. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: A death in Russell's family forces Gamby into the role of North Jackson's acting principal. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Russell's birthday bash is marred by a revelation about his wife's college boyfriend. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Russell's job is in jeopardy due to a plot to sabotage a standardized test, and Gamby is caught in the middle. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Gamby gets unexpected company on spring break; Amanda is illuminated during a winter retreat. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: The approach of prom night escalates tensions between Gamby and Russell. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.sub-title: The Union of the Wizard & The Warrior
programme.desc: The series concludes with a startling end to the school year. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between a rookie cop and his seasoned partner (who's also his future brother-in-law) in this sidesplitting action comedy. After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a drug lord with the help of a savvy detective. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dream Scenario
programme.desc: The narrative follows a very unkempt professor named Paul Matthews. His life is quite uneventful until suddenly, his image appears in people's dreams. Soon, millions of strangers find themselves dreaming about him. The event made him an overnight sensation. However, things change when these dreams soon become nightmares for some and, later, for many. (Repeat).

programme.title: Problemista
programme.desc: A young immigrant from El Salvador is facing his last month in the United States unless he can find a sponsor. Living in New York City has been tough as his career as a toy creator has not gone to plan. At the eleventh hour, he finds a unique artist who may become his sponsor—as long as he helps her with her next exhibition. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: In this amusing fish-out-of-water workplace comedy, a 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy start-up fashion company. Later, he unexpectedly becomes a confidant for the overwhelmed young CEO. (Repeat).

programme.title: Amanda Seales: I Be Knowin'
programme.desc: In her HBO debut, Amanda Seales humorously explores social norms and personal identity, engaging the audience with her unique perspective. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alex Edelman: Just For Us
programme.desc: In the wake of a string of anti-Semitic threats online, comedian Alex Edelman goes straight to the source, covertly attending a meeting of white nationalists and coming face-to-face with the people behind the keyboards. (Repeat).

programme.title: 7 Days in Hell
programme.desc: A mockumentary chronicling an epic tennis match at Wimbledon between outrageous American troublemaker Aaron Williams and dim-witted English prodigy Charles Poole. (Repeat).

programme.title: Leo Reich: Literally Who Cares?!
programme.desc: Leo Reich faces the swirling uncertainty of our collective future, asking the big questions. Treading the line between hilarious stand-up and humorless performance art, this special blends songs, anecdotes, and anxious non-sequiturs in a valiant attempt to raise awareness about important social and political causes or something. (Repeat).

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: Texan Renee Zellweger boasts a perfect English accent in this delightful adaptation of Helen Fielding's novel. She plays Bridget, a London "singleton" desperate to lose weight, cut down on her vices and find Mr. Right. The film chronicles her romantic entanglements with two gents: her playboy boss (Hugh Grant) and a snooty lawyer (Colin Firth). Jim Broadbent, Gemma Jones. (Repeat).

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Renée Zellweger, Colin Firth and Hugh Grant return for this must-see sequel. Charming but insecure Bridget has finally landed the reserved Mr. Darcy (Firth), but she is concerned that their relationship won't last. Adding to her worries is the fact that her new employers have paired her with her womanizing ex-boyfriend, Daniel Cleaver (Grant). (Repeat).

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: Bridget Jones, now a fortysomething news producer, discovers that she's pregnant in this hilarious comedy sequel. However, she isn't sure if the baby's father is Mark Darcy, her on-and-off boyfriend, or Jack Qwant, her new American love interest. (Repeat).

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this hysterical big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. (Repeat).

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Entertaining biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: A Hollywood hooker signs on for a weeklong job with a john who is a corporate raider; he pays for a makeover so she can act as his "date." (Repeat).

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: This adorable comedy follows an ambitious mariachi singer who hopes to convince a customs worker to accept his visa, and finds love in the process. (Repeat).

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: Thrills and laughs go hand in hand as a single woman and a spy elude a federal agent and uncover the truth about a clandestine mission gone awry, while a CIA director tries to discover why the unlikely duo have taken flight. (Repeat).

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: The story of a single mother of two who is fighting to keep her family stable in a precarious world, and the sacrifices that she has to make to survive. When Kirsty is left with spiraling debts by her ex-partner who has vanished, she meets a neighbor, Ryan, who offers to help her out of the hole that she's in. But all is not as it seems, forcing Kirsty into some dark and desperate decisions; an abyss that seems to have no way out. (Repeat).

programme.title: I Am
programme.desc: The story of a woman who's searching for a romantic ideal: Nicola, who wants the perfect relationship but finds herself stuck in a dysfunctional and coercive relationship. Nicola is a hairdresser who begins to tire of her daily routine of listening to her clients gush about special occasions, engagements and exciting holiday plans. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: In this suspense-filled horror film, two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote Pennsylvania farm. (Repeat).

programme.title: He's Just Not That Into You
programme.desc: This amusing and insightful relationship romp, set in Baltimore, follows an interconnected group of twenty-and-thirtysomething singles and marrieds as they try to get to the heart of what makes for true love. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: Terror comes at a frightening clip when a group of teens have a close brush with death at a racetrack, only to find the Grim Reaper striking back at them with a vengeance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Black Adam is awakened after being imprisoned for nearly five thousand years. This significant being tries to exist in modern climes despite his brusque ways and ancient-trained means. The members of the Justice Society of America try to befriend him, hopefully retraining him as well. They need to come together soon to fight a more powerful villain about to wreak havoc on the world. (Repeat).

programme.title: Braddock: Missing in Action III
programme.desc: Chuck Norris invades Vietnam again to rescue a wife he thought dead and a son he didn't know he had. Quoc: Aki Aleong. Tan Cang: Roland Harrah III. Lin: Miki Kim. Polanski: Yehuda Efroni. Directed by Aaron Norris. (Repeat).

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: In this breathtaking epic, English adventurer John Smith finds love with Pocahontas after arriving in America and being pardoned from a death sentence. Meanwhile, European settlers establish a shaky truce with the Native Americans. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: This piercing drama follows a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy as their lives intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife. (Repeat).

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Tension reaches a fever pitch as Boston homicide detective Thomas Craven investigates his daughter's murder and learns she had been leading a double life. Determined to discover the identity of his daughter's killer, Craven soon uncovers evidence of corporate cover-ups and a government conspiracy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A wimpy account manager (James McAvoy) is recruited by a sexy mystery woman (Angelina Jolie) to join a secret society of assassins and avenge the murder of his estranged father. Morgan Freeman costars in this non-stop action thrill ride. Directed by Timur Bekmambetov. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Losers
programme.desc: In this explosive thriller, a team of mercenaries wage war on the CIA after they're double-crossed during a mission by rogue agent Max (Jason Patric). But in order to get to Max, the team will need a little help from sexy operative Aisha (Zoe Saldana), who has her own reasons for joining the fight. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: Posse: The Revenge of Jesse Lee
programme.desc: Shoot-'em-up action and a flashy visual style drive this entertaining Old West tale. Director-star Mario Van Peebles saddles up as the laconic leader of a posse that comes to the aid of black townspeople who are besieged by a tyrannical sheriff (Richard Jordan). The fine cast includes Billy Zane, Blair Underwood, Pam Grier and Melvin Van Peebles (Mario's father). (Repeat).

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: If you thought Harry Potter was cool, just wait until you meet Darren Shan (Chris Massoglia)! After being turned into a vampire, Darren joins a traveling freak show and attempts to stop a war between the vampires and their bitter rivals, the Vampanese. John C. Reilly, Willem Dafoe, Salma Hayek. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
programme.desc: A womanizer is haunted by his many old flames while attending his brother's wedding in this rollicking romantic comedy starring Matthew McConaughey. Having conquered almost the entire bridal party, libidinous celebrity photographer Connor Mead ponders bedding the bride's mother until the Ghosts of Girlfriends Past guide him on an eye-opening tour of his romantic past, present and future. Hilarity blends with heartache as they attempt to discern whether Connor will ever be able to mend his ways. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Lionheart
programme.desc: In 2011, two-time Indianapolis 500 champion Dan Wheldon died in a horrific crash at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway, shaking the world of motorsports to its core. Ten years later, Dan's two sons, Sebastian and Oliver, follow in their father's footsteps as they work through their loss the only way they know how by getting behind the wheel to race. (Repeat).

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: A documentary team heads for the Brazilian jungle to search for a remote native tribe, but ends up fleeing from a giant snake. (Repeat).

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: An army of alien spaceships attack Earth and threaten to destroy the human race, but a handful of survivors band together to stop the invasion. (Repeat).

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: In this intense thrill ride, street-racing mechanic Tobey embarks on a cross-country mission of vengeance against shady ex-NASCAR driver Dino, who framed him for a crime he didn't commit. Now, Tobey must defeat Dino in a major underground race with the help of Julia, an ingenious car broker. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD. (Repeat).

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This fascinating reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the scientist builds an undead creature that turns dangerous, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself. (Repeat).

programme.title: 21 and Over
programme.desc: A gifted medical student puts his education in jeopardy when he decides to celebrate his 21st birthday with two rowdy pals the night before a crucial exam in this sidesplitting comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: Thrills and laughs go hand in hand as a single woman and a spy elude a federal agent and uncover the truth about a clandestine mission gone awry, while a CIA director tries to discover why the unlikely duo have taken flight. (Repeat).

programme.title: Priscilla
programme.desc: After bumping into Elvis Presley at a party, teenager Priscilla Beaulieu becomes enamored with the musical icon. Their courtship and consequent marriage change Priscilla's life. What follows is a tantalizing, turbulent journey of love and fame. Based on the true story of the Presley family, the drama film chronicles Priscilla's relationship with Elvis Presley. (Repeat).

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: When aliens invade a poor neighborhood in London in this thrilling sci-fi romp, a group of rowdy teens decide to fight back and defend their home turf, while a woman (Jodie Whittaker) whom they mugged inadvertently gets caught up in their struggle. (Repeat).

programme.title: Evil Dead Rise
programme.desc: This installment of the Evil Dead franchise centers on a complicated family and the demons that haunt them. Estranged sisters Beth and Ellie reunite after many years. Beth drops by Ellie's apartment in Los Angeles where she raises her three kids as a single mother. The sisters discover an ominous book that unleashes a flesh-possessing demon. When the demon takes control of Beth, Ellie and her kids face the worst nightmare of their lives. (Repeat).

programme.title: Vampires Suck
programme.desc: In this hilariously irreverent parody of the "Twilight" series, smitten teen Becca is courted by two rivals as the prom draws near, while her friends struggle to find dates to the dance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gia
programme.desc: True story of top model Gia Carangi's rise to fame in the 1970's to her untimely downfall. She arrives in New York from Philadelphia, having escaped abuse, and quickly becomes the forefront of the modeling industry until she becomes a drug addict. (Repeat).

programme.title: After the Bite
programme.desc: Following a series of great white shark attacks that dominated the headlines, one Cape Cod community renegotiates its relationship with the marine environment. Local residents, fishermen, and environmentalists are forced to confront dramatic changes to their way of life. How far can we push nature before it bites back? (Repeat).

programme.title: Braddock: Missing in Action III
programme.desc: Chuck Norris invades Vietnam again to rescue a wife he thought dead and a son he didn't know he had. Quoc: Aki Aleong. Tan Cang: Roland Harrah III. Lin: Miki Kim. Polanski: Yehuda Efroni. Directed by Aaron Norris. (Repeat).

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: Mexican teenager Jaime Reyes returns home from college full of idealism and hope for his country's future. But his home isn't as he left it. Dejected and without direction now that his dreams have been dashed, Jaime finds an ancient scarab that turns out to be an alien symbiote. When the scarab chooses him, Jaime becomes the third incarnation of the superhero, The Blue Beetle. This film is a superhero movie based on the DC comic of the same name. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: In this epic fantasy adventure, a young thief named Bek enlists the help of the powerful Egyptian god Horus to overthrow the vicious deity Set, who has seized control of the land. Bek's true love has been captured, forcing the mortal rebel to fight back in order to free her and the people of Egypt from Set's tyrannical rule. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: The rise of the Roman Empire gets the royal treatment in this 12-episode series, which begins in 52 B.C., when Julius Caesar conquers Gaul. In other events, two soldiers distinguish themselves on an important mission and Pompey Magnus conspires with the Senate against his old friend Caesar. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.sub-title: How Titus Pullo Brought Down the Republic
programme.desc: Lucius Vorenus's sudden return after eight years at war sparks an uncomfortable homecoming; Mark Antony joins the Senate as tribune of the people; Titus Pullo's night of debauchery spells trouble for the future of the Republic; Caesar mobilizes his legion for the long trip back to Rome. Niobe: Indira Varma. Cicero: David Bamber. Octavian: Max Pirkis. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Caesar's rapid advance on Rome prompts Pompey to order a tactical retreat, which compels citizens to choose sides; Atia sends Timon to do her dirty work; Vorenus is puzzled by the lack of resistance on a scouting mission. Timon: Lee Boardman. Servilia: Lindsay Duncan. Brutus: Tobias Menzies. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: After taking control of Rome, Caesar is the honored guest at a party given by Atia; a mission by Pompey's son to retrieve stolen gold goes awry; Vorenus celebrates his new career as a businessman. Quintus: Rick Warden. Servilia: Lindsay Duncan. Niobe: Indira Varma. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.sub-title: The Ram Has Touched the Wall
programme.desc: Financial woes compel Vorenus to take drastic action in his choice of careers; Pullo is hired to tutor Octavian but also seeks the clever lad's advice; Antony urges Caesar to go after Pompey; Atia conspires to drive a wedge between Servilia and her uncle. Servilia: Lindsay Duncan. Octavian: Max Pirkis. Directed by Allen Coulter ("The Sopranos"). (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Now outnumbered by Pompey's legions, Caesar asks Antony to join him in Greece; a reluctant Octavian is urged by his mother to complete another rite of passage; Vorenus and Niobe try to rekindle their passion; Pullo passes on a rumor to Lyde about Evander; Atia sends a gift to Servilia. Posca: Nicholas Woodeson. Octavian: Max Pirkis. Octavia: Kerry Condon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Pompey gambles by going on the offensive and engaging an outnumbered Caesar in Greece; rough waters strand Vorenus and Pullo in the Adriatic Sea; and Atia sends her daughter on another errand to Servilia's. Servilia: Lindsay Duncan. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Caesar chases Pompey all the way to Egypt, and meets the young ruler Ptolemy XIII in Alexandria; Vorenus and Pullo rescue Ptolemy's sister Cleopatra from captivity. Ptolemy: Scott Chisholm. Cleopatra: Lyndsey Marshal. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Caesar returns a hero following the defeat of Scipio and Cato. Elsewhere, Caesar pardons Vorenus and Pullo for their showdown with the thuggish Erastes; and Servilia plots to uncover a secret about Caesar by exploiting Octavia. Ciaran Hinds, Kevin McKidd, Lindsay Duncan. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A triumphant Caesar announces a celebration in his honor; Vorenus uses Posca's help to run for public office; Pullo envisions a different life after rising from the ranks of the enlisted; Servilia's latest houseguest troubles Brutus. Eirene: Chiara Mastalli. Posca: Nicholas Woodeson. Quintus: Rick Warden. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Pullo's latest job has dire consequences; a former comrade approaches Vorenus about veterans' benefits; Brutus reexamines his relationship with Caesar; Antony tries to rekindle his romance with Atia. Mascius: Michael Nardone. Cassius: Guy Henry. Timon: Lee Boardman. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Servilia orchestrates a diversion to facilitate a plot in the Senate; Vorenus avoids Caesar's punishment for rescuing Pullo in the arena; Atia is puzzled by an invitation to Servilia's home; and Pullo seeks forgiveness for his misdeeds. Brutus: Tobias Menzies. Niobe: Indira Varma. Cicero: David Bamber. (Repeat).

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: This gripping and transcendent epic adaptation of the classic graphic novel is set in 1985 America, where a cadre of forced-into-retirement superheroes investigate the murder of one of their own and uncover a wide-ranging conspiracy. The dark and visually stunning adventure was directed by Zack Snyder, who deemed his film version "a separate artistic experience from the book." (Repeat).

programme.title: 3 Days to Kill
programme.desc: An ex-Secret Service agent sets out on one last mission in exchange for an experimental drug that could save his life in this high-flying thriller. Meanwhile, he is tasked with looking after his estranged daughter as the drug's debilitating side effects begin to take hold. (Repeat).

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Minimalist, edge-of-your-seat thriller about a couple accidentally left at sea in shark-infested waters during a scuba-diving excursion. (Repeat).

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A seafaring birthday celebration takes a turn for the terrifying when the passengers of a luxury yacht forget to lower the automated ladder before jumping into the ocean for a playful swim. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: After her beloved grandmother is diagnosed with terminal cancer, a Chinese-American woman returns to China for a family gathering secretly designed to say goodbye to the matriarch. However, when it becomes apparent that grandma is the only one unaware of the diagnosis, she struggles to keep the secret. (Repeat).

programme.title: Conviction
programme.desc: A Massachusetts wife and mother (Hilary Swank) dedicates her life to becoming a lawyer in hopes of exonerating her imprisoned brother (Sam Rockwell), whom she believes was wrongfully convicted of a murder in this electrifying drama directed by Tony Goldwyn. (Repeat).

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: This stunning sci-fi sequel finds the nations of Earth banding together to fight off a second alien invasion, 20 years after the first attack brought humanity to the brink of extinction. Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the alliance readies itself for a massive war. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Shortly after Caesar's murder, Octavian devises a plan to keep his family from fleeing the city, news that Antony happily delivers to a nervous Brutus. Meanwhile, Vorenus mourns Niobe's death but curses his children, and Pullo and Eirene get married without knowing what's happened back in Rome. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Octavian's endless demands for his inheritance rankle Antony, who is distracted by a visit from Cleopatra; Vorenus is ordered to quell the chaos among the Aventine merchants that he helped create by killing Erastes; Timon is surprised by his brother's arrival from Jerusalem. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.sub-title: These Being the Words of Marcus Tullius Cicero
programme.desc: Pullo tries in vain to persuade Vorenus to prevent a war among Aventine gangs; Antony's designs on Gaul elicit a shocking proclamation from Cicero to the Senate; Servilia enlists the opportunistic Duro to end an old feud; Brutus wrestles with his demons while seeking support in Bithynia. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rome
programme.sub-title: Testudo et Lepus (The Tortoise and the Hare)
programme.desc: Pullo races to find Vorenus with news of the fate of his children; Servilia pays a price for trying to eliminate a rival; a victorious Octavian sends word he's returning to Rome with his army, which comes as a surprise to Cicero; Timon grows weary of doing his mistress's bidding. (Repeat).
